================
Install: 
================

Install via `pip` ::

    pip install fmutils

#. `PyPi <https://pypi.org/project/fmutils/>`_
#. `GitHub <https://github.com/Mr-TalhaIlyas/fmutils>`_


Dependencies
=============

* numpy
* pandas
* matplotlib
* shutil
* os
* pathlib
* tqdm

Language
=========

* python > 3.6

OS 
===
* Linux
* Windows
